      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String createEmailMessageToRetrievePassword(String retrieveCode, String login) 
      User createUser(String name)
      This method create a user.
      To create a login, it's use the first letter of first name and the last name plus the id of user.
      And just set the password for "default" password: A12345678a.
      ex.: Jefferson Campos id 6669 will be "jcampos6669" with the password "A12345678a".
      protected String encryptPassword(String password)
      This function encrypt the password with MD5 method.

      Create a code based in:
      retrieveCode = id_user + login + email + IP address + actual date
      If the code is already in DB, will throw a exception (the code must be unique!)!

      • rewriteLogin

        protected String rewriteLogin(String login)
        This method remove all signals that wasn't in English language.
        Parameters:
        login - A login to be rewrite.
        Returns:
        correct login.

      • encryptPassword

        protected String encryptPassword(String password)
                          throws NoSuchAlgorithmException

        This function encrypt the password with MD5 method.

        Parameters:
        password - A password to be encrypt.
        Returns:
        a encrypted password.
        Throws:
        NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • createUser

        public User createUser(String name)

        This method create a user.
        To create a login, it's use the first letter of first name and the last name plus the id of user.
        And just set the password for "default" password: A12345678a.
        ex.: Jefferson Campos id 6669 will be "jcampos6669" with the password "A12345678a".

        Parameters:
        name - : A name to get login.
        entity - : A user to be filled.
        Since:
        SIGERAR v1.1 - Apr/2008.

        public boolean verifyUser(User entity)

        public User resetPassword(User entity)

      • sendLinkToRetrievePassword

        public boolean sendLinkToRetrievePassword(User entity,
                                 String retrieveCode,
                                 String fileName)
                                   throws UserException,
                                          RetrieveCodeException
        Send a link to retrieve a password. Don't implement it self, but call sendLinkToRetrievePassword(User entity, String subject, String mailText) and load properties from file.
        If file name is null, use default file: /awknet-commons.properties
        Parameters:
        entity - a user without password or ID.
        fileName - if null, use default file: /awknet-commons.properties
        Returns:
        call sendLinkToRetrievePassword(User entity, String subject, String mailText) and return a boolean
        Throws:
        UserException
        RetrieveCodeException

      • sendLinkToRetrievePassword

        public boolean sendLinkToRetrievePassword(User entity,
                                 String subject,
                                 String mailText,
                                 String fileName)
                                   throws UserException
        Send a link to retrieve a password.
        Parameters:
        entity - a user without password or ID.
        subject - defined by user.
        mailText - body of e-mail defined by user.
        Returns:
        true if find and send a email to retrieve password.
        Throws:
        UserException

      • generateCodeToRetrievePassword

        public String generateCodeToRetrievePassword(Long userID,
                                    String ip)
                                      throws UserException,
                                             RetrieveCodeException
        Create a code based in:
        retrieveCode = id_user + login + email + IP address + actual date
        If the code is already in DB, will throw a exception (the code must be unique!)!
        Parameters:
        userID -
        Returns:
        a retrieve code to password
        Throws:
        UserException
        RetrieveCodeException

      • isValidRequest

        public boolean isValidRequest(Date requestDate,
                     String retrieveCode)
                       throws RetrieveCodeException
        Verify if a retrieve code still valid. The default time validation is 2 days.
        Parameters:
        requestDate -
        Returns:
        true for if is valid.
        Throws:
        RetrieveCodeException

      • updatePasswordToDefault

        public boolean updatePasswordToDefault(String retireveCode)
        Update password using default password: A12345678a.
        Parameters:
        retireveCode - must be a valid one!
        Returns:
        true if update was successful.

      • saveOrUpdate

        public void saveOrUpdate(User _user,
                boolean cryptPassword)
                  throws UserException
        Save or update a user in DB.
        Parameters:
        _user - a user to be saved.
        cryptPassword - choose if password must be encrypted or not.
        Throws:
        UserException - if an error occurs (both for: [HibernateException | NoSuchAlgorithmException])
